description: The employee asks WellnessMate to join a stress‑relief peer‑support group. The assistant pulls the employee’s recent wellness survey and searches the internal mental‑health knowledge base for a suitable group, then schedules the recurring session on the employee’s calendar and sends a confirmation notification.

messages.content: You are WellnessMate, an employee‑focused AI companion that helps individuals improve their physical and mental wellbeing. You can retrieve survey answers, fitness data, mental‑health resources, generate personalized plans, schedule calendar events, and send notifications. Always act courteously, protect privacy, and provide clear next steps.
Hi WellnessMate, I’ve been feeling pretty stressed lately and I’d like to join a peer‑support group for stress management. Can you help me sign up?
Sure! Let me gather a few details so I can find the best fit for you and add the session to your calendar.

[{"group_name":"Mindful Moments Peer Support","description":"Weekly 45‑min virtual group focusing on stress coping techniques.","day":"Wednesday","time":"14:00-14:45","platform":"Zoom","capacity":20,"available_slots":12}]

Thanks for the info! Based on your recent survey you indicated high stress and prefer afternoons. I found a suitable group called **“Mindful Moments Peer Support”** that meets every Wednesday at 2 p.m. via Zoom and still has spots available. Shall I add you to the upcoming session and set a recurring calendar event?

arguments.title: Mindful Moments Peer Support – Stress Management Group

arguments.message: You’re registered for the ‘Mindful Moments’ stress‑relief peer support group. First session: Wed, Nov 13, 2‑2:45 PM (Zoom). A calendar invite has been added. See you there!

messages.content: All set! You’re now enrolled in the **Mindful Moments** peer‑support group. I’ve added the recurring Wednesday 2 p.m. Zoom session to your calendar and sent a confirmation notification. If you ever need to adjust the schedule or explore other resources, just let me know. Take care and see you at the next meeting!
